1. addi x5, x1 ,15	- I-format
000000001111 00001 000 00101 0010011
 imm[11:0]    rs1   f3  rd    opcode

2. and x3, x2, x5	- R-format
0000000 00101 00010 111 00011 0110011
   f7    rs1   rs2   f3   rd   opcode

3. sw x3, -3(x5)	- S-format
1111111   00011 00101 010  11101   0100011
imm[11:5]  rs1   rs2   f3 imm[4:0]  opcode

4. beq x3, x5, 36	- SB-format
0000001 00101 00011 000 00100 1100011
(This one works - ignore)


00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000111100001000001010010011
00000000010100010111000110110011
11111110001100101010111010100011
00000010010100011000001001100011


addi x1, x0, 1

addi x2, x0, 2

add  x3, x1, x2

sub  x4, x3, x1
